question.title: Best practices for breaking down long methods and modularizing large features in Spring Boot
question.body:
I’m working on refactoring a legacy codebase with a method that’s grown to several hundred lines.
The method mixes many responsibilities and is difficult to maintain.
Because the codebase is old, I have constraints on changing the existing structure and public APIs.
What’s a good approach to modularizing this method into smaller, well-defined functional blocks?
